title: Upvoes and Downvotes Rendered Meaningless by Bots and Alts
body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/ENg5udYp-mana-based-champions-have-one-disadvantage-over-energy-based?comment=000e

This is just one example of bot and alt accounts abusing the forum vote system. For over a day, the above discussion received dozens of up votes with multiple people voicing their agreement on the subject.

Recently, in less than an hour, the topic received down votes until it reached a 0 score.

This isn't the first time this has happened.
